superman.name: Superman
superman.creator: DC
superman.powers: super strength, flight, invulnerability, super speed, heat vision, freeze breath, x-ray vision, superhuman hearing, healing factor

thor.name: Thor
thor.creator: Marvel
thor.powers: superhuman strength, speed, agility, durability and immunity to most diseases

daredevil.name: Daredevil
daredevil.creator: Marvel
daredevil.powers: Superhuman senses Echolocative radar sense Skilled acrobat, martial artist, and stick fighter Utilization of specially-designed billy club

wolverine.name: Wolverine
wolverine.creator: Marvel
wolverine.powers: superhuman strength and reflexes, enhanced senses and tracking abilities, and a special healing power that also slows his aging.

captain america.name: Captain America
captain america.creator: Marvel
captain america.powers: Peak-Human Condition, Accelerated Healing Factor, Enhanced Intelligence, Longevity

iceman.name: Iceman
iceman.creator: Marvel
iceman.powers: ability to manipulate ice and cold by freezing water vapor around him

human torch.name: Human Torch
human torch.creator: Marvel
human torch.powers: engulf his entire body in flames, fly, absorb fire harmlessly into his own body, and control any nearby fire by sheer force of will

nightcrawler.name: Nightcrawler
nightcrawler.status: deceased but has been resurrected many times
nightcrawler.creator: Marvel
nightcrawler.powers: superhuman agility, the ability to teleport, and adhesive hands and feet

hawkeye.name: Hawkeye
hawkeye.creator: Marvel
hawkeye.powers: Master archer and marksman Expert tactician, acrobat and hand-to-hand combatant Using a variety of trick arrows As Goliath: Superhuman strength and durability Size and mass manipulation

doctor strange.name: Doctor Strange
doctor strange.creator: Marvel
doctor strange.powers: Mastery of magic Utilizes mystical artifacts, such as the Cloak of Levitation and the Eye of Agamotto Genius-level intellect Skilled martial artist Gifted physician and surgeon

cyclops.name: Cyclops
cyclops.creator: Marvel
cyclops.powers: Emits powerful beams of energy from his eyes

spiderman.name: Spiderman
spiderman.status: deceased but brought back to life
spiderman.creator: Marvel
spiderman.powers: Peter was bitten by a radioactive spider. The spider bite gave Peter spider-like powers withsuper strength and reflexes

loki.name: Loki
loki.creator: Marvel
loki.powers: strength, durability, and longevity far superior to humans

thanos.name: Thanos
thanos.creator: Marvel
thanos.powers: all types of poison, disease, and telepathic attack

shao kahn.name: Shao Kahn
shao kahn.creator: Mortal Kombat
shao kahn.powers: utilize magic and has superhuman strength and durability. He is also able to charge at the opponent with considerable speed and power

ermac.name: Ermac
ermac.creator: Mortal Kombat
ermac.powers: telekinesis and he also can manipulate soul energy to levitate and fire energy blasts
